text: Berthold's worm lizard (Leposternon infraorbitale) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Brazil. ==References== Category:Leposternon Category:Reptiles described in 1859 Category:Taxa named by Arnold Adolph Berthold Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Brazil
title: Berthold's worm lizard
